title: WTB/T: T205 Sovereign Archer, Ball, Bates
author: HercDriver

posts.post_title: WTB/T: T205 Sovereign Archer, Ball, Bates
posts.post_content:
I'm looking for a Sovereign T205 of any of those guys, so if you have one to sell or trade, let me know.  If you have a Neal Ball, and don't want to sell/trade, can you send me a front/back scan?  I can't seem to find one anywhere!

Take Care,
Geno
